## Description

Product information

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit UNC 3 x 48

* * *

With this BaerCoil® thread repair set it is possible to repair through hole and blind-hole threads in UNC No. 3 x 48.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. With the inserts you avoid scrap in your components and can recycle them. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping out.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. For the thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) is cut for the wire thread insert. This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

For repair directly on the thread, this thread repair kit contains various auxiliary tools, such as the core drill bit, hand tap with oversize for insert thread, insertion tool, tang breaker and wire thread inserts made of stainless steel.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, if necessary, according to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | No. 3 |
| Pitch | 48 |
| Dimension | UNC No. 3 x 48 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 3,77 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 1.5 D means 1.5 times the diameter: 1.5 times 2.51 mm=3.77 mm<br>The nominal diameter at UNC No. 3 is approx. 2.51 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts - Repair kits |
| Product type | BaerCoil thread repair kits |
| Thread standard | UNC: American Unified National Coarse thread according to ANSI B1.1 |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and for thread reinforcement of through-hole and blind-hole threads.

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing BaerCoil thread insert](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | No. 3 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 3,77 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 0,124 '' - 0,139 '' |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |
| B (thread depth with chamfer) | 0,221 '' |
| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 0,242 '' |

### Content

- 1 x 16126: BaerCoil HSS twist drill bit 2.60 mm
- 1 x B3121: BaerCoil HSSG single-cut tap UNC 3 x 48 EG
- 1 x EBW02: BaerCoil Installation tool UNC 3 x 48
- 1 x BZ002: BaerCoil Tang breaker UNC 3 x 48
- 10 x B8213-15: BaerCoil thread inserts UNC No. 3 x 48 - Length: 1.5 D - Type: "free running" - Material: A2 (1.4301)

### Payment & Security

Payment methods

- American Express
- Apple Pay
- Bancontact
- Google Pay
- iDEAL
- Maestro
- Mastercard
- Shop Pay
- Union Pay
- Visa

Your payment information is processed securely. We do not store credit card details nor have access to your credit card information.

###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

Product information

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit UNC 3 x 48

* * *

With this BaerCoil® thread repair set it is possible to repair through hole and blind-hole threads in UNC No. 3 x 48.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. With the inserts you avoid scrap in your components and can recycle them. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping out.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. For the thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) is cut for the wire thread insert. This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

For repair directly on the thread, this thread repair kit contains various auxiliary tools, such as the core drill bit, hand tap with oversize for insert thread, insertion tool, tang breaker and wire thread inserts made of stainless steel.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, if necessary, according to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

| Diameter | No. 3 |
| Pitch | 48 |
| Dimension | UNC No. 3 x 48 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 3,77 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 1.5 D means 1.5 times the diameter: 1.5 times 2.51 mm=3.77 mm<br>The nominal diameter at UNC No. 3 is approx. 2.51 mm |

### Characteristics

## Description

Complete BaerCoil Thread-Repair-Kit

Contents:

1 x M3 BaerCoil Drill Bit

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Tap

1 x BaerCoil Inserting Tool

1 x BaerCoil Tang Break Tool

\+ 20 BaerCoil Wire-Thread-Inserts "free running", stainless steel (ASIS 304), lenght: 1,5 x D

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear

strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread

normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive,

medical and aerospace industries.

## UNC 4 x 40 BaerCoil Kit (Helicoil Type)

**$68.00** ~~~~

Complete BaerCoil Thread-Repair-Kit

Contents:

1 x M3 BaerCoil Drill Bit

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Tap

1 x BaerCoil Inserting Tool

1 x BaerCoil Tang Break Tool

\+ 20 BaerCoil Wire-Thread-Inserts "free running", stainless steel (ASIS 304), lenght: 1,5 x D

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear

strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread

normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive,

medical and aerospace industries.

Style

- TRS 4 - 40 UNC KIT
- 4 - 40 UNC BAERCOIL KIT

UNC 5 X 40 BaerCoil Kit (Helicoil Type)


**$40.00** ~~~~

## Description

Complete BaerCoil Thread-Repair-Kit

Contents:

1 x M3.4 BaerCoil Drill Bit

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Tap

1 x BaerCoil Inserting Tool

1 x BaerCoil Tang Break Tool

\+ 20 BaerCoil Wire-Thread-Inserts "free running", stainless steel (ASIS 304), lenght: 1,5 x D

[BaerCoil instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

[Drill Sizes](http://www.baercoil.com/en/drill_sizes.html)

[UNC Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_unc.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear

strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread

normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive,

medical and aerospace industries.

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/ask-question-2-ce96e3e01c85a38a0d39c61cfae6d42c_small.jpg?263)

# **Got a Question?** **Call 01-4730900**

### Payment & Security

Payment methods

- American Express
- Apple Pay
- Bancontact
- Google Pay
- iDEAL
- Maestro
- Mastercard
- Shop Pay
- Union Pay
- Visa

Your payment information is processed securely. We do not store credit card details nor have access to your credit card information.

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## Description

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit UNC 6 x 32

* * *

With this BaerCoil® thread repair set it is possible to repair through hole and blind-hole threads in UNC No. 6 x 32.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. With the inserts you avoid scrap in your components and can recycle them. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping out.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. For the thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) is cut for the wire thread insert. This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

For repair directly on the thread, this thread repair kit contains various auxiliary tools, such as the core drill bit, hand tap with oversize for insert thread, insertion tool, tang breaker and wire thread inserts made of stainless steel.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, if necessary, according to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | No. 6 |
| Pitch | 32 |
| Dimension | UNC No. 6 x 32 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 5,26 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 1.5 D means 1.5 times the diameter: 1.5 times 3.51 mm=5.26 mm<br>The nominal diameter at UNC No. 6 is approx. 3.51 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts - Repair kits |
| Product type | BaerCoil thread repair kits |
| Thread standard | UNC: American Unified National Coarse thread according to ANSI B1.1 |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and for thread reinforcement of through-hole and blind-hole threads.

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing BaerCoil thread insert](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | No. 6 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 5,26 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 0,175 '' - 0,193 '' |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |
| B (thread depth with chamfer) | 0,316 '' |
| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 0,348 '' |

### Content

- 1 x 16137: BaerCoil HSS twist drill bit 3.70 mm
- 1 x B3103: BaerCoil HSSG single-cut tap UNC 6 x 32 EG
- 1 x EBW03: BaerCoil Installation tool UNC 6 x 32
- 1 x BZ003: BaerCoil Tang breaker UNC 6 x 32
- 20 x B8203-15: BaerCoil thread inserts UNC No. 6 x 32 - Length: 1.5 D - Type: "free running" - Material: A2 (1.4301)

### Payment & Security

Your payment information is processed securely. We do not store credit card details nor have access to your credit card information.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit UNC 6 x 32

* * *

With this BaerCoil® thread repair set it is possible to repair through hole and blind-hole threads in UNC No. 6 x 32.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. With the inserts you avoid scrap in your components and can recycle them. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping out.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. For the thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) is cut for the wire thread insert. This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

For repair directly on the thread, this thread repair kit contains various auxiliary tools, such as the core drill bit, hand tap with oversize for insert thread, insertion tool, tang breaker and wire thread inserts made of stainless steel.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, if necessary, according to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

| Diameter | No. 6 |
| Pitch | 32 |
| Dimension | UNC No. 6 x 32 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 5,26 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 1.5 D means 1.5 times the diameter: 1.5 times 3.51 mm=5.26 mm<br>The nominal diameter at UNC No. 6 is approx. 3.51 mm |

## Description

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit UNC 8 x 32

* * *

With this BaerCoil® thread repair set it is possible to repair through hole and blind-hole threads in UNC No. 8 x 32.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. With the inserts you avoid waste in your components and can recycle them. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping out.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. For the thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) is cut for the wire thread insert. This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

For repair directly on the thread, this thread repair kit contains various auxiliary tools, such as the core drill bit, hand tap with oversize for insert thread, insertion tool, tang breaker and wire thread inserts made of stainless steel.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, if necessary, according to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | No. 8 |
| Pitch | 32 |
| Dimension | UNC No. 8 x 32 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 6,25 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 1.5 D means 1.5 times the diameter: 1.5 times 4.17 mm=6.25 mm<br>The nominal diameter at UNC No. 8 is approx. 4.17 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts - Repair kits |
| Product type | BaerCoil thread repair kits |
| Thread standard | UNC: American Unified National Coarse thread according to ANSI B1.1 |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and for thread reinforcement of through-hole and blind-hole threads.

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing BaerCoil thread insert](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | No. 8 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 6,25 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 0,201 '' - 0,220 '' |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |
| B (thread depth with chamfer) | 0,355 '' |
| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 0,387 '' |

### Content

- 1 x 16145: BaerCoil HSS twist drill bit 4.50 mm
- 1 x B3104: BaerCoil HSSG single-cut tap UNC 8 x 32 EG
- 1 x EBW04: BaerCoil Installation tool UNC 8 x 32
- 1 x BZ004: BaerCoil Tang breaker UNC 8 x 32
- 20 x B8204-15: BaerCoil thread inserts UNC No. 8 x 32 - Length: 1.5 D - Type: "free running" - Material: A2 (1.4301)

BAERCOIL


## UNC 8 x 32 BaerCoil Kit (Helicoil Type)

**$68.00** ~~~~

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit UNC 8 x 32

* * *

With this BaerCoil® thread repair set it is possible to repair through hole and blind-hole threads in UNC No. 8 x 32.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. With the inserts you avoid waste in your components and can recycle them. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping out.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. For the thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) is cut for the wire thread insert. This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

For repair directly on the thread, this thread repair kit contains various auxiliary tools, such as the core drill bit, hand tap with oversize for insert thread, insertion tool, tang breaker and wire thread inserts made of stainless steel.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, if necessary, according to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | No. 8 |
| Pitch | 32 |
| Dimension | UNC No. 8 x 32 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 6,25 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 1.5 D means 1.5 times the diameter: 1.5 times 4.17 mm=6.25 mm<br>The nominal diameter at UNC No. 8 is approx. 4.17 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts - Repair kits |
| Product type | BaerCoil thread repair kits |
| Thread standard | UNC: American Unified National Coarse thread according to ANSI B1.1 |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and for thread reinforcement of through-hole and blind-hole threads.

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing BaerCoil thread insert](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | No. 8 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 6,25 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 0,201 '' - 0,220 '' |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |
| B (thread depth with chamfer) | 0,355 '' |
| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 0,387 '' |

### Content

- 1 x 16145: BaerCoil HSS twist drill bit 4.50 mm
- 1 x B3104: BaerCoil HSSG single-cut tap UNC 8 x 32 EG
- 1 x EBW04: BaerCoil Installation tool UNC 8 x 32
- 1 x BZ004: BaerCoil Tang breaker UNC 8 x 32
- 20 x B8204-15: BaerCoil thread inserts UNC No. 8 x 32 - Length: 1.5 D - Type: "free running" - Material: A2 (1.4301)

Style

- UNC 8 X 32 X BAERCOIL KIT
- TRS 8 X 32 UNC KIT

## Description

Complete BaerCoil Thread-Repair-Kit

Contents:

1 x M5.2 BaerCoil Drill Bit

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Tap

1 x BaerCoil Inserting Tool

1 x BaerCoil Tang Break Tool

\+ 20 BaerCoil Wire-Thread-Inserts "free running", stainless steel (ASIS 304), lenght: 1,5 x D

[BaerCoil instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

[Drill Sizes](http://www.baercoil.com/en/drill_sizes.html)

[UNC Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_unc.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear

strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread

normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive,

medical and aerospace industries.

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/ask-question-2-ce96e3e01c85a38a0d39c61cfae6d42c_small.jpg?263)

###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

[BaerCoil instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

## Description

Complete BaerCoil Thread-Repair-Kit

Contents:

1 x M5.8 BaerCoil Drill Bit

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Tap

1 x BaerCoil Inserting Tool

1 x BaerCoil Tang Break Tool

\+ 10 BaerCoil Wire-Thread-Inserts "free running", stainless steel (ASIS 304), lenght: 1,5 x D

[BaerCoil instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

[Drill Sizes](http://www.baercoil.com/en/drill_sizes.html)

[UNC Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_unc.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear

strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread

normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive,

medical and aerospace industries.

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/ask-question-2-ce96e3e01c85a38a0d39c61cfae6d42c_small.jpg?263)

###### Circlips

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## Description

Product information

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit UNC 1/4 x 20

* * *

With this BaerCoil® thread repair set it is possible to repair through hole threads and blind-hole threads in UNC 1/4 x 20.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. With the inserts you avoid waste in your components and can recycle them. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping out.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. For the thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) is cut for the wire thread insert. This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

For repair directly on the thread, this thread repair kit contains various auxiliary tools, such as the core drill bit, hand tap with oversize for insert thread, insertion tool, tang breaker and wire thread inserts made of stainless steel.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, if necessary, according to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 1/4 |
| Pitch | 20 |
| Dimension | UNC 1/4 x 20 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 9,53 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 1.5 D means 1.5 times the diameter: 1.5 times 6.35 mm=9.53 mm<br>The nominal diameter at UNC 1/4 is approx. 6.35 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts - Repair kits |
| Product type | BaerCoil thread repair kits |
| Thread standard | UNC: American Unified National Coarse thread according to ANSI B1.1 |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and for thread reinforcement of through-hole and blind-hole threads.

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing BaerCoil thread insert](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | 1/4 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 9,53 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 0,308 '' - 0,330 '' |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |
| B (thread depth with chamfer) | 0,550 '' |
| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 0,600 '' |

### Content

- 1 x 16167: BaerCoil HSS twist drill bit 6.70 mm
- 1 x B3107: BaerCoil HSSG single-cut tap UNC 1/4 x 20 EG
- 1 x EBW06: BaerCoil installation tool UNC 1/4 x 20
- 1 x BZ006: BaerCoil Tang breaker UNC 1/4 x 20
- 20 x B8207-15: BaerCoil thread inserts UNC 1/4 x 20 - Length: 1.5 D - Type: "free running" - Material: A2 (1.4301)

BAERCOIL


## UNC 1/4 X 20 BaerCoil Kit (Helicoil Type)

**$56.00** ~~~~

Product information

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit UNC 1/4 x 20

* * *

With this BaerCoil® thread repair set it is possible to repair through hole threads and blind-hole threads in UNC 1/4 x 20.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. With the inserts you avoid waste in your components and can recycle them. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping out.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. For the thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) is cut for the wire thread insert. This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

For repair directly on the thread, this thread repair kit contains various auxiliary tools, such as the core drill bit, hand tap with oversize for insert thread, insertion tool, tang breaker and wire thread inserts made of stainless steel.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, if necessary, according to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 1/4 |
| Pitch | 20 |
| Dimension | UNC 1/4 x 20 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 9,53 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 1.5 D means 1.5 times the diameter: 1.5 times 6.35 mm=9.53 mm<br>The nominal diameter at UNC 1/4 is approx. 6.35 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts - Repair kits |
| Product type | BaerCoil thread repair kits |
| Thread standard | UNC: American Unified National Coarse thread according to ANSI B1.1 |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and for thread reinforcement of through-hole and blind-hole threads.

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing BaerCoil thread insert](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | 1/4 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 9,53 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 0,308 '' - 0,330 '' |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |
| B (thread depth with chamfer) | 0,550 '' |
| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 0,600 '' |

### Content

- 1 x 16167: BaerCoil HSS twist drill bit 6.70 mm
- 1 x B3107: BaerCoil HSSG single-cut tap UNC 1/4 x 20 EG
- 1 x EBW06: BaerCoil installation tool UNC 1/4 x 20
- 1 x BZ006: BaerCoil Tang breaker UNC 1/4 x 20
- 20 x B8207-15: BaerCoil thread inserts UNC 1/4 x 20 - Length: 1.5 D - Type: "free running" - Material: A2 (1.4301)

Style

- UNC 1/4 X 20 BaerCoil Kit (Helicoil Type)

[View product](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/unc-1-4-x-20-baercoil-kit-helicoil)

## Description

Product information

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit UNC 5/16 x 18

With this BaerCoil® thread repair set it is possible to repair through hole and blind-hole threads in UNC 5/16 x 18.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. With the inserts you avoid waste in your components and can recycle them. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping out.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. For the thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) is cut for the wire thread insert. This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

For repair directly on the thread, this thread repair kit contains various auxiliary tools, such as the core drill bit, hand tap with oversize for insert thread, insertion tool, tang breaker and wire thread inserts made of stainless steel.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, if necessary, according to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 5/16 |
| Pitch | 18 |
| Dimension | UNC 5/16 x 18 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 11,91 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 1.5 D means 1.5 times the diameter: 1.5 times 7.94 mm=11.91 mm<br>The nominal diameter at UNC 5/16 is approx. 7.94 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts - Repair kits |
| Product type | BaerCoil thread repair kits |
| Thread standard | UNC: American Unified National Coarse thread according to ANSI B1.1 |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and for thread reinforcement of through-hole and blind-hole threads.

### Technical drawing

![](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | 5/16 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 11,91 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 0,377 '' - 0,400 '' |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |
| B (thread depth with chamfer) | 0,663 '' |
| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 0,719 '' |

### Content

- 1 x 16183: BaerCoil HSS twist drill bit 8.30 mm
- 1 x B3108: BaerCoil HSSG single-cut tap UNC 5/16 x 18 EG
- 1 x EBW07: BaerCoil installation tool UNC 5/16 x 18
- 1 x BZ006: BaerCoil Tang breaker UNC 5/16 x 18
- 20 x B8208-15: BaerCoil thread inserts UNC 5/16 x 18 - Length: 1.5 D - Type: "free running" - Material: A2 (1.4301)

BAERCOIL


## UNC 5/16 x 18 BaerCoil Kit (Helicoil Type)

**$66.00** ~~~~

Product information

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit UNC 5/16 x 18

With this BaerCoil® thread repair set it is possible to repair through hole and blind-hole threads in UNC 5/16 x 18.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. With the inserts you avoid waste in your components and can recycle them. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping out.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. For the thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) is cut for the wire thread insert. This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

For repair directly on the thread, this thread repair kit contains various auxiliary tools, such as the core drill bit, hand tap with oversize for insert thread, insertion tool, tang breaker and wire thread inserts made of stainless steel.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, if necessary, according to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 5/16 |
| Pitch | 18 |
| Dimension | UNC 5/16 x 18 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 11,91 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 1.5 D means 1.5 times the diameter: 1.5 times 7.94 mm=11.91 mm<br>The nominal diameter at UNC 5/16 is approx. 7.94 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts - Repair kits |
| Product type | BaerCoil thread repair kits |
| Thread standard | UNC: American Unified National Coarse thread according to ANSI B1.1 |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and for thread reinforcement of through-hole and blind-hole threads.

### Technical drawing

![](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | 5/16 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 11,91 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 0,377 '' - 0,400 '' |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |
| B (thread depth with chamfer) | 0,663 '' |
| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 0,719 '' |

### Content

- 1 x 16183: BaerCoil HSS twist drill bit 8.30 mm
- 1 x B3108: BaerCoil HSSG single-cut tap UNC 5/16 x 18 EG
- 1 x EBW07: BaerCoil installation tool UNC 5/16 x 18
- 1 x BZ006: BaerCoil Tang breaker UNC 5/16 x 18
- 20 x B8208-15: BaerCoil thread inserts UNC 5/16 x 18 - Length: 1.5 D - Type: "free running" - Material: A2 (1.4301)

Style

- UNC 5/16 x 18 BaerCoil Kit (Helicoil Type)

## Description

Product information

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit UNC 3/8 x 16

With this BaerCoil® thread repair-set it is possible to repair through hole threads and blind hole threads in UNC 3/8 x 16.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. With the inserts you avoid waste in your components and can recycle them. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping out.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. For the thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) is cut for the wire thread insert. This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

For repair directly on the thread, this thread repair kit contains various auxiliary tools, such as the core drill bit, hand tap with oversize for insert thread, insertion tool, tang breaker and wire thread inserts made of stainless steel.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, if necessary, according to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 3/8 |
| Pitch | 16 |
| Dimension | UNC 3/8 x 16 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 14,29 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 1.5 D means 1.5 times the diameter: 1.5 times 9.53 mm=14.29 mm<br>The nominal diameter at UNC 3/8 is approx. 9.53 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts - Repair kits |
| Product type | BaerCoil thread repair kits |
| Thread standard | UNC: American Unified National Coarse thread according to ANSI B1.1 |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and for thread reinforcement of through-hole and blind-hole threads.

### Technical drawing

![](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | 3/8 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 14,29 mm |

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

Product information

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit UNC 3/8 x 16

With this BaerCoil® thread repair-set it is possible to repair through hole threads and blind hole threads in UNC 3/8 x 16.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. With the inserts you avoid waste in your components and can recycle them. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping out.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, if necessary, according to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

## Delivery and Shipping

**Shipping Information**

Place your order before 2 PM for same-day shipping!

UNC 7/16 x 14 BaerCoil Kit (Helicoil Type)

## Description

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit UNC 7/16 x 14

* * *

With this BaerCoil® thread repair set it is possible to repair through hole threads and blind-hole threads in UNC 7/16 x 14.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. With the inserts you avoid waste in your components and can recycle them. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping out.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. For the thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) is cut for the wire thread insert. This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

For repair directly on the thread, this thread repair kit contains various auxiliary tools, such as the core drill bit, hand tap with oversize for insert thread, insertion tool, tang breaker and wire thread inserts made of stainless steel.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, if necessary, according to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 7/16 |
| Pitch | 14 |
| Dimension | UNC 7/16 x 14 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 16,67 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 1.5 D means 1.5 times the diameter: 1.5 times 11.11 mm=16.67 mm<br>The nominal diameter at UNC 7/16 is approx. 11.11 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts - Repair kits |
| Product type | BaerCoil thread repair kits |
| Thread standard | UNC: American Unified National Coarse thread according to ANSI B1.1 |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and for thread reinforcement of through-hole and blind-hole threads.

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing BaerCoil thread insert](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | 7/16 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 16,67 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 0,520 '' - 0,551 '' |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |
| B (thread depth with chamfer) | 0,906 '' |
| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 0,978 '' |

### Content

- 1 x 161115: BaerCoil HSS twist drill bit 11.50 mm
- 1 x B3110: BaerCoil HSSG single-cut tap UNC 7/16 x 14 EG
- 1 x EBW10: BaerCoil installation tool UNC 7/16 x 14
- 1 x BZ010: BaerCoil Tang breaker UNC 7/16 x 14
- 10 x B8210-15: BaerCoil thread inserts UNC 7/16 x 14 - Length: 1.5 D - Type: "free running" - Material: A2 (1.4301)

###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## UNC 7/16 x 14 BaerCoil Kit (Helicoil Type)

**$89.00** ~~~~

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit UNC 7/16 x 14

* * *

With this BaerCoil® thread repair set it is possible to repair through hole threads and blind-hole threads in UNC 7/16 x 14.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. With the inserts you avoid waste in your components and can recycle them. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping out.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. For the thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) is cut for the wire thread insert. This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

For repair directly on the thread, this thread repair kit contains various auxiliary tools, such as the core drill bit, hand tap with oversize for insert thread, insertion tool, tang breaker and wire thread inserts made of stainless steel.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, if necessary, according to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 7/16 |
| Pitch | 14 |
| Dimension | UNC 7/16 x 14 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 16,67 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 1.5 D means 1.5 times the diameter: 1.5 times 11.11 mm=16.67 mm<br>The nominal diameter at UNC 7/16 is approx. 11.11 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts - Repair kits |
| Product type | BaerCoil thread repair kits |
| Thread standard | UNC: American Unified National Coarse thread according to ANSI B1.1 |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and for thread reinforcement of through-hole and blind-hole threads.

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing BaerCoil thread insert](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | 7/16 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 16,67 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 0,520 '' - 0,551 '' |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |
| B (thread depth with chamfer) | 0,906 '' |
| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 0,978 '' |

- 1 x 161115: BaerCoil HSS twist drill bit 11.50 mm
- 1 x B3110: BaerCoil HSSG single-cut tap UNC 7/16 x 14 EG
- 1 x EBW10: BaerCoil installation tool UNC 7/16 x 14
- 1 x BZ010: BaerCoil Tang breaker UNC 7/16 x 14
- 10 x B8210-15: BaerCoil thread inserts UNC 7/16 x 14 - Length: 1.5 D - Type: "free running" - Material: A2 (1.4301)

## Description

Product information

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit UNC 1/2 x 13

* * *

With this BaerCoil® thread repair set it is possible to repair through hole threads and blind hole threads in UNC 1/2 x 13.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. With the inserts you avoid waste in your components and can recycle them. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping out.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. For the thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) is cut for the wire thread insert. This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

For repair directly on the thread, this thread repair kit contains various auxiliary tools, such as the core drill bit, hand tap with oversize for insert thread, insertion tool, tang breaker and wire thread inserts made of stainless steel.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, if necessary, according to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 1/2 |
| Pitch | 13 |
| Dimension | UNC 1/2 x 13 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 19,05 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 1.5 D means 1.5 times the diameter: 1.5 times 12.7 mm=19.05 mm<br>The nominal diameter at UNC 1/2 is approx. 12.7 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts - Repair kits |
| Product type | BaerCoil thread repair kits |
| Thread standard | UNC: American Unified National Coarse thread according to ANSI B1.1 |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and for thread reinforcement of through-hole and blind-hole threads.

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing of BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | 1/2 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 19,05 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 0,588 '' - 0,622 '' |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |
| B (thread depth with chamfer) | 1,019 '' |
| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 1,096 '' |

### Content

- 1 x 161130: BaerCoil HSS twist drill bit 13.00 mm
- 1 x B3111: BaerCoil HSSG single-cut tap UNC 1/2 x 13 EG
- 1 x EBW12: BaerCoil Installation tool UNC 1/2 x 13
- 1 x BZ012: BaerCoil Tang breaker UNC 1/2 x 13
- 10 x B8211-15: BaerCoil thread inserts UNC 1/2 x 13 - Length: 1.5 D - Type: "free running" - Material: A2 (1.4301)

BAERCOIL


## UNC 1/2 x 13 BaerCoil Kit (Helicoil Type)

**$92.00** ~~~~

Product information

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit UNC 1/2 x 13

* * *

With this BaerCoil® thread repair set it is possible to repair through hole threads and blind hole threads in UNC 1/2 x 13.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. With the inserts you avoid waste in your components and can recycle them. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping out.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. For the thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) is cut for the wire thread insert. This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

For repair directly on the thread, this thread repair kit contains various auxiliary tools, such as the core drill bit, hand tap with oversize for insert thread, insertion tool, tang breaker and wire thread inserts made of stainless steel.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, if necessary, according to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 1/2 |
| Pitch | 13 |
| Dimension | UNC 1/2 x 13 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 19,05 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 1.5 D means 1.5 times the diameter: 1.5 times 12.7 mm=19.05 mm<br>The nominal diameter at UNC 1/2 is approx. 12.7 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts - Repair kits |
| Product type | BaerCoil thread repair kits |
| Thread standard | UNC: American Unified National Coarse thread according to ANSI B1.1 |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and for thread reinforcement of through-hole and blind-hole threads.

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing of BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | 1/2 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 19,05 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 0,588 '' - 0,622 '' |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |
| B (thread depth with chamfer) | 1,019 '' |
| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 1,096 '' |

### Content

- 1 x 161130: BaerCoil HSS twist drill bit 13.00 mm
- 1 x B3111: BaerCoil HSSG single-cut tap UNC 1/2 x 13 EG
- 1 x EBW12: BaerCoil Installation tool UNC 1/2 x 13
- 1 x BZ012: BaerCoil Tang breaker UNC 1/2 x 13
- 10 x B8211-15: BaerCoil thread inserts UNC 1/2 x 13 - Length: 1.5 D - Type: "free running" - Material: A2 (1.4301)

Style

- 1/2 X 13 UNC BAERCOIL KIT
- TRS 1/2 X 13 KIT

## Description

Product information

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit UNC 9/16 x 12

* * *

With this BaerCoil® thread repair set it is possible to repair through hole threads and blind-hole threads in UNC 9/16 x 12.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. With the inserts you avoid waste in your components and can recycle them. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping out.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. For the thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) is cut for the wire thread insert. This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

For repair directly on the thread, this thread repair set contains various auxiliary tools, such as the hand tap with oversize for insert threads, insertion tool and wire thread inserts made of stainless steel.

This set does not include twist drill bit and tang breaker. To drill the core hole, a 14.8 mm twist drill bit is still needed here. The tenon can be broken with the installation tool. To do this, pull the installation tool back after installation and turn it 90° so that it rests on the tenon. Then strike the tool briefly at the back.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, if necessary, to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 9/16 |
| Pitch | 12 |
| Dimension | UNC 9/16 x 12 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 21,43 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 1.5 D means 1.5 times the diameter: 1.5 times 14.29 mm=21.43 mm<br>The nominal diameter at UNC 9/16 is approx. 14.29 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts - Repair kits |
| Product type | BaerCoil thread repair kits |
| Thread standard | UNC: American Unified National Coarse thread according to ANSI B1.1 |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and for thread reinforcement of through-hole and blind-hole threads.

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing BaerCoil thread insert](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | 9/16 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 21,43 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 0,659 '' - 0,694 '' |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |
| B (thread depth with chamfer) | 1,135 '' |
| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 1,219 '' |

### Content

- 1 x B3112: BaerCoil HSSG single-cut tap UNC 9/16 x 12 EG
- 1 x EBW14: BaerCoil Installation tool UNC 9/16 x 12
- 10 x B8212-15: BaerCoil thread inserts UNC 9/16 x 12 - Length: 1.5 D - Type: "free running" - Material: A2 (1.4301)

**$129.00** ~~~~

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit UNC 9/16 x 12

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

For repair directly on the thread, this thread repair set contains various auxiliary tools, such as the hand tap with oversize for insert threads, insertion tool and wire thread inserts made of stainless steel.

This set does not include twist drill bit and tang breaker. To drill the core hole, a 14.8 mm twist drill bit is still needed here. The tenon can be broken with the installation tool. To do this, pull the installation tool back after installation and turn it 90° so that it rests on the tenon. Then strike the tool briefly at the back.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, if necessary, to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 9/16 |
| Pitch | 12 |
| Dimension | UNC 9/16 x 12 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 21,43 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 1.5 D means 1.5 times the diameter: 1.5 times 14.29 mm=21.43 mm<br>The nominal diameter at UNC 9/16 is approx. 14.29 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts - Repair kits |
| Product type | BaerCoil thread repair kits |
| Thread standard | UNC: American Unified National Coarse thread according to ANSI B1.1 |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and for thread reinforcement of through-hole and blind-hole threads.

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing BaerCoil thread insert](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | 9/16 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 21,43 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 0,659 '' - 0,694 '' |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |
| B (thread depth with chamfer) | 1,135 '' |
| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 1,219 '' |

### Content

- 1 x B3112: BaerCoil HSSG single-cut tap UNC 9/16 x 12 EG
- 1 x EBW14: BaerCoil Installation tool UNC 9/16 x 12
- 10 x B8212-15: BaerCoil thread inserts UNC 9/16 x 12 - Length: 1.5 D - Type: "free running" - Material: A2 (1.4301)

## Description

Complete BaerCoil Thread-Repair-Kit

Contents:

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Tap

1 x BaerCoil Inserting Tool

\+ 5 BaerCoil Wire-Thread-Inserts "free running", stainless steel (ASIS 304), lenght: 1,5 x D

[BaerCoil instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

[Drill Sizes](http://www.baercoil.com/en/drill_sizes.html)

[UNC Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_unc.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear

strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread

normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive,

medical and aerospace industries.
