![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/unf-1-x-12-baercoil-kit)

BAERCOIL


## UNF 1" x 12 BaerCoil Kit

**$332.00** ~~~~

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit UNF 1'' 12

* * *

With this BaerCoil® thread repair set it is possible to repair through hole threads and blind hole threads in UNF 1" x 12.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. With the inserts you avoid scrap in your components and can recycle them. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping out.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. For the thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) is cut for the wire thread insert. This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

For repair directly on the thread, this thread repair set contains various auxiliary tools, such as the hand tap with oversize for insert threads, insertion tool and wire thread inserts made of stainless steel.

This set does not include twist drill bit and tang breaker. To drill the core hole, a 26 mm twist drill bit is still needed here. The tenon can be broken with the installation tool. To do this, pull back the installation tool after installation and turn it 90° so that it rests on the tenon. Then strike the tool briefly at the back.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, if necessary, to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 1" |
| Pitch | 12 |
| Dimension | UNF 1" x 12 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 38,1 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 1.5 D means 1.5 times the diameter: 1.5 times 25.4 mm=38.1 mm<br>The nominal diameter for UNF 1" is approx. 25.4 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts - Repair kits |
| Product type | BaerCoil thread repair kits |
| Thread standard | UNF: American Fine Unified National thread according to ANSI B1.1 |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and for thread reinforcement of through-hole and blind-hole threads.

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing BaerCoil thread insert](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | 1" |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 38,1 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 1,097 '' - 1,199 '' |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |
| B (thread depth with chamfer) | 1,792 '' |
| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 1,875 '' |

### Content

- 1 x B3164: BaerCoil HSSG single-cut tap UNF 1'' x 12 EG
- 1 x EBW24: BaerCoil Installation tool UNF 1'' x 12
- 5 x B8237-15: BaerCoil thread inserts UNF 1" x 12 - Length: 1.5 D - Type: free-running - Material: A2 (1.4301)

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Workshop Kit M 3 - M 12

With this BaerCoil® thread repair set it is possible to repair through hole threads and blind-hole threads in M 3 - 12.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. With the inserts you avoid scrap in your components and can recycle them. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping out.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. For the thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) is cut for the wire thread insert. This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

For repair directly on the thread, this thread repair magazine contains various auxiliary tools, such as the core drill bit, hand taps with oversize for insert threads, insertion tools, tang breakers and wire thread inserts made of stainless steel.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened if necessary, according to the required length, with a side cutter or similar.

###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## M3 - M12 BaerCoil Workshop Kit (Helicoil Type)

**$356.00** ~~~~

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Workshop Kit M 3 - M 12

With this BaerCoil® thread repair set it is possible to repair through hole threads and blind-hole threads in M 3 - 12.

This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

## Description

Product information

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Workshop Kit M 5 - M 12

With this BaerCoil® thread repair set it is possible to repair through hole threads and blind-hole threads in M 5 - 12.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. With the inserts you avoid scrap in your components and can recycle them. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping out.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. For the thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) is cut for the wire thread insert. This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

For repair directly on the thread, this thread repair magazine contains various auxiliary tools, such as the core drill bit, hand taps with oversize for insert threads, insertion tools, tang breakers and wire thread inserts made of stainless steel.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened if necessary, according to the required length, with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 5 - 12 |
| Dimension | M 5 - 12 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts - Repair kits |
| Product type | BaerCoil thread repair workshop kits |
| Thread standard | M: Metric ISO standard thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO2/6H |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and for thread reinforcement of through-hole and blind-hole threads.

### Content

| Machine- screw tap | Machine installation tool | Tang breakers | core drill bit | Taper countersink | thread inserts Length: 1,5 x D | thread inserts Length: 2,5 x D |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| M 5 x 0.8 | EBW05 | BZ005 | 5.2 mm | 10.4 mm | 10 pcs. | 5 pcs. |
| M 6 x 1.0 | EBW06 | BZ006 | 6.3 mm | 10.4 mm | 10 pcs. | 5 pcs. |
| M 8 x 1.25 | EBW08 | BZ008 | 8.3 mm | 10.4 mm | 10 pcs. | 5 pcs. |
| M 10 x 1.5 | EBW10 | BZ010 | 10.4 mm | 16.5 mm | 5 pcs. | 5 pcs. |
| M 12 x 1.75 | EBW12 | BZ012 | 12.4 mm | 16.5 mm | 5 pcs. | 5 pcs. |

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Workshop Kit M 5 - M 12

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. ## Description

BaerCoil Thread Repair Workshop Kit M 5 - M 8

in metal box

Box Content:

BaerCoil Drill HSS

STI Bottoming Tap HSSG

BaerCoil Inserting Tool

BaerCoil Tang Break Tool

\+ Wire Thread Inserts - type: "free running" - lengths: **1.5 D - 2.5 D**

**different lengths for most applications**

| BaerCoil Tap | Inserting Tool | Tang Break Tool | Drill | Wire Thread Inserts length: 1.5 D | Wire Thread Inserts length: 2.5 D |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| M 5 x 0.8 | EBW05 | BZ005 | 5.2 mm | 10 | 5 |
| M 6 x 1.0 | EBW06 | BZ006 | 6.3 mm | 10 | 5 |
| M 8 x 1.25 | EBW08 | BZ008 | 8.3 mm | 10 | 5 |

Lengths of the Wire Thread Inserts: 1.5 D and 2.5 D (D= Diameter) - stainless Steel

[BaerCoil instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

[Drill Sizes](http://www.baercoil.com/en/drill_sizes.html)

[Metric Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/ask-question-2-ce96e3e01c85a38a0d39c61cfae6d42c_small.jpg?263)

in metal box

| BaerCoil Tap | Inserting Tool | Tang Break Tool | Drill | Wire Thread Inserts length: 1.5 D | Wire Thread Inserts length: 2.5 D |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| M 5 x 0.8 | EBW05 | BZ005 | 5.2 mm | 10 | 5 |
| M 6 x 1.0 | EBW06 | BZ006 | 6.3 mm | 10 | 5 |
| M 8 x 1.25 | EBW08 | BZ008 | 8.3 mm | 10 | 5 |

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

## Description

BaerCoil Thread Repair Workshop Kit M 6 - M 10

in metal box

Box Content:

BaerCoil Drill HSS

STI Bottoming Tap HSSG

BaerCoil Inserting Tool

BaerCoil Tang Break Tool

\+ Wire Thread Inserts - type: "free running" - lengths: **1.5 D - 2.5 D**

**different lengths for most applications**

| BaerCoil Tap | Inserting Tool | Tang Break Tool | Drill | Wire Thread Inserts length: 1.5 D | Wire Thread Inserts length: 2.5 D |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| M 6 x 1.0 | EBW06 | BZ006 | 6.3 mm | 10 | 5 |
| M 8 x 1.25 | EBW08 | BZ008 | 8.3 mm | 10 | 5 |
| M 10 x 1.5 | EBW10 | BZ010 | 10.4 mm | 5 | 5 |

Lengths of the Wire Thread Inserts: 1.5 D and 2.5 D (D= Diameter) - stainless Steel

[BaerCoil instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

[Drill Sizes](http://www.baercoil.com/en/drill_sizes.html)

[Metric Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

| M 14 x 1.25\* | EBW14 | 5 Stk. 8.4 mm | 5 Stk. 12.4 mm | 5 Stk. 16.4 mm |

## M10 - M14 Spark Plug BaerCoil Kit (Helicoil Type)

**$190.00** ~~~~

BaerCoil Thread Repair Workshop Kit for Spark Plug

in metal box

Box Content:

STI Tap HSSG, for Spark Plug

Inserting Tool

Wire Thread Inserts - type: "free running"

**different lengths for most applications**

| Tap for Spark Plug | Inserting Tool | Wire Thread Inserts | Wire Thread Inserts | Wire Thread Inserts |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| M 10 x 1.0\* | EBW10 | 5 Stk. 10 mm | 5 Stk. 15 mm | 5 Stk. 20 mm |
| M 12 x 1.25\* | EBW12 | 5 Stk. 12 mm | 5 Stk. 18 mm | 5 Stk. 24 mm |
| M 14 x 1.25\* | EBW14 | 5 Stk. 8.4 mm | 5 Stk. 12.4 mm | 5 Stk. 16.4 mm |

\*Combined drilling and tapping tool for Spark Plug (no pre-drilling necessary).

[BaerCoil instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

[Drill Sizes](http://www.baercoil.com/en/drill_sizes.html)

[Metric Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

## Description

BaerCoil Thread-Repair-Workshop-Kit for Oil Drain Plug

in metal box

Box Content:

BaerCoil Drill HSS

STI Bottoming Tap HSSG

BaerCoil Inserting Tool

\+ Wire Thread Inserts - type: "free running" **different lengths for most applications**

| BaerCoil Tap | Inserting Tool | Drill | Wire Thread Inserts | Wire Thread Inserts |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| M 12 x 1.5 | EBW12 | 12.4 mm | 5 pcs. 12 mm | 5 pcs. 18 mm |
| M 14 x 1.5 | EBW14 | 14.4 mm | 5 pcs. 14 mm | 5 pcs. 21 mm |
| M 16 x 1.5 | EBW14 | - | 5 pcs. 16 mm | 5 pcs. 24 mm |

for Oil Drain Plug

[BaerCoil instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

[Drill Sizes](http://www.baercoil.com/en/drill_sizes.html)

[Metric Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/ask-question-2-ce96e3e01c85a38a0d39c61cfae6d42c_small.jpg?263)

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## Description

BaerCoil Thread Repair Workshop Kit M 6 - M 14 x 1.5\* (\*Oil Drain Plug)

in metal box

Box Content:

BaerCoil Drill HSS

STI Bottoming Tap HSSG

BaerCoil Inserting Tool

BaerCoil Tang Break Tool

\+ Wire Thread Inserts - type: "free running" - lengths: **1.5 D - 2.5 D**

**different lengths for most applications**

| BaerCoil Tap | Inserting Tool | Tang Break Tool | Drill | Wire Thread Inserts length: 1.5 D | Wire Thread Inserts length: 2.5 D |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| M 6 x 1.0 | EBW06 | BZ006 | 6.3 mm | 10 | 5 |
| M 8 x 1.25 | EBW08 | BZ008 | 8.3 mm | 10 | 5 |
| M 10 x 1.5 | EBW10 | BZ010 | 10.4 mm | 5 | 5 |
| M 12 x 1.75 | EBW12 | BZ012 | 12.4 mm | 5 | 5 |
| M 14 x 1.5\* | EBW14 | - | 14.4 mm | 5 pcs. 14 mm | 5 pcs. 21 mm |

\*for Oil Drain Plug

Lengths of the Wire Thread Inserts: 1.5 D and 2.5 D (D= Diameter) - stainless Steel

[BaerCoil instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

[Drill Sizes](http://www.baercoil.com/en/drill_sizes.html)

[Metric Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

BAERCOIL


## M6 - M14 X 1.5 BaerCoil Workshop Kit (Helicoil Type)

**$205.00** ~~~~

BaerCoil Thread Repair Workshop Kit M 6 - M 14 x 1.5\* (\*Oil Drain Plug)

in metal box

Box Content:

BaerCoil Drill HSS

STI Bottoming Tap HSSG

BaerCoil Inserting Tool

BaerCoil Tang Break Tool

\+ Wire Thread Inserts - type: "free running" - lengths: **1.5 D - 2.5 D**

**different lengths for most applications**

| BaerCoil Tap | Inserting Tool | Tang Break Tool | Drill | Wire Thread Inserts length: 1.5 D | Wire Thread Inserts length: 2.5 D |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| M 6 x 1.0 | EBW06 | BZ006 | 6.3 mm | 10 | 5 |
| M 8 x 1.25 | EBW08 | BZ008 | 8.3 mm | 10 | 5 |
| M 10 x 1.5 | EBW10 | BZ010 | 10.4 mm | 5 | 5 |
| M 12 x 1.75 | EBW12 | BZ012 | 12.4 mm | 5 | 5 |
| M 14 x 1.5\* | EBW14 | - | 14.4 mm | 5 pcs. 14 mm | 5 pcs. 21 mm |

\*for Oil Drain Plug

Lengths of the Wire Thread Inserts: 1.5 D and 2.5 D (D= Diameter) - stainless Steel

[BaerCoil instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

[Drill Sizes](http://www.baercoil.com/en/drill_sizes.html)

[Metric Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/m6-m14-x-1-5-baercoil-workshop-kit-helicoil)

## Description

BaerCoil Thread Repair Workshop Kit M 6 - M 14 x 1.25\* (\*Spark Plug)

in metal box

Box Content:

BaerCoil Drill HSS

STI Bottoming Tap HSSG

BaerCoil Inserting Tool

BaerCoil Tang Break Tool

\+ Wire Thread Inserts - type: "free running" - lengths: **1.5 D - 2.5 D**

**different lengths for most applications**

| BaerCoil Tap | Inserting Tool | Tang Break Tool | Drill | Wire Thread Inserts length: 1.5 D | Wire Thread Inserts length: 2.5 D | Wire Thread Inserts |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| M 6 x 1.0 | EBW06 | BZ006 | 6.3 mm | 10 | 5 | - |
| M 8 x 1.25 | EBW08 | BZ008 | 8.3 mm | 10 | 5 | - |
| M 10 x 1.5 | EBW10 | BZ010 | 10.4 mm | 5 | 5 | - |
| M 12 x 1.75 | EBW12 | BZ012 | 12.4 mm | 5 | 5 | - |
| M 14 x 1.25\* | EBW14 | - | - | 5 pcs. 8.4 mm | 5 pcs. 12.4 mm | 5 pcs. 16.4 mm |

\*Combined drilling and tapping tool for Spark Plug (no pre-drilling necessary).

Lengths of the Wire Thread Inserts: 1.5 D and 2.5 D (D= Diameter) - stainless Steel

[BaerCoil instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

[Drill Sizes](http://www.baercoil.com/en/drill_sizes.html)

[Metric Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/ask-question-2-ce96e3e01c85a38a0d39c61cfae6d42c_small.jpg?263)

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

| M 6 x 1.0 | EBW06 | BZ006 | 6.3 mm | 10 pcs. 9 mm | 5 pcs. 15 mm | - |
| M 10 x 1.0\* | EBW10 | - | - | 5 pcs. 10 mm | 5 pcs. 15 mm | 5 pcs. 20 mm |
| M 12 x 1.25\* | EBW12 | - | - | 5 pcs. 12 mm | 5 pcs. 18 mm | 5 pcs. 24 mm |
| M 12 x 1.5\*\* | EBW12 | BZ012 | 12.4 mm | 5 pcs. 12 mm | 5 pcs. 18 mm | - |
| M 14 x 1.25\* | EBW14 | - | - | 5 pcs. 8.4 mm | 5 pcs. 12.4 mm | 5 pcs. 16.4 mm |
| M 14 x 1.5\*\* | EBW14 | - | 14.4 mm | 5 pcs. 14 mm | 5 pcs. 21 mm | - |

\*Combined drilling and tapping tool for Spark Plug (no pre-drilling necessary).

\\*\\* For Oil Drain Plug

[BaerCoil instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

[Drill Sizes](http://www.baercoil.com/en/drill_sizes.html)

[Metric Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

BSW 1/8 x 40 BaerCoil® Kit (Helicoil Type)

## Description

Complete BaerCoil Thread-Repair-Kit

Content:

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Standard Drill

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Tap

1 x BaerCoil Inserting Tool

1 x BaerCoil Tang Break Tool

\+ 20 BaerCoil Wire-Thread-Inserts "free running", stainless steel (ASIS 304), lenght: 1,5 x D

[BaerCoil instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

[Drill Sizes](http://www.baercoil.com/en/drill_sizes.html)

[BSW Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_bsw.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear

strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread

normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive,

medical and aerospace industries.

## Delivery and Shipping

**Shipping Information**

Place your order before 2 PM for same-day shipping!

We partner with **DPD** for all deliveries, ensuring **full traceability** and a **one-hour delivery window**, so you don’t have to wait around all day.

**Shipping Cost:** €8.99

**Free Shipping:** On orders over €50

Fast, reliable, and hassle-free delivery—straight to your door!

All our orders are picked, packed and shipped in Dublin! Order before 2pm for Next Day DPD Delivery anywhere in Ireland.

BSW 3/16 x 24 BaerCoil® Kit (Helicoil Type)


**$82.00** ~~~~

[View details](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/bsw-3-16-x-24-baercoil-kit-helicoil#product-info)

We ship with DPD

Order before 2pm for next day delivery

Need to collect? We are open 9am - 5pm Mon Friday Saturday 10am - 4PM

## Description

Complete BaerCoil Thread-Repair-Kit

Content:

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Standard Drill

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Tap

1 x BaerCoil Inserting Tool

1 x BaerCoil Tang Break Tool

\+ 20 BaerCoil Wire-Thread-Inserts "free running", stainless steel (ASIS 304), lenght: 1,5 x D

[BaerCoil instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

[Drill Sizes](http://www.baercoil.com/en/drill_sizes.html)

[BSW Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_bsw.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear

strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread

normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive,

medical and aerospace industries.

### Payment & Security

Payment methods

- American Express
- Apple Pay
- Bancontact
- Google Pay
- iDEAL
- Maestro
- Mastercard
- Shop Pay
- Union Pay
- Visa

Your payment information is processed securely. We do not store credit card details nor have access to your credit card information.

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## Delivery and Shipping

**Shipping Information**

Place your order before 2 PM for same-day shipping!

BSW 5/16 x 18 BaerCoil® Kit (Helicoil Type)


**$79.00** ~~~~

[View details](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/bsw-5-16-x-18-baercoil-kit-helicoil#product-info)

We ship with DPD

## Description

Complete BaerCoil Thread-Repair-Kit

Content:

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Standard Drill

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Tap

1 x BaerCoil Inserting Tool

1 x BaerCoil Tang Break Tool

\+ 20 BaerCoil Wire-Thread-Inserts "free running", stainless steel (ASIS 304), lenght: 1,5 x D

[BaerCoil instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

[Drill Sizes](http://www.baercoil.com/en/drill_sizes.html)

[BSW Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_bsw.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear

strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread

normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive,

medical and aerospace industries.

Payment methods

- American Express
- Apple Pay
- Bancontact
- Google Pay
- iDEAL
- Maestro
- Mastercard
- Shop Pay
- Union Pay
- Visa

Your payment information is processed securely. We do not store credit card details nor have access to your credit card information.

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

BSW 7/16 x 14 BaerCoil® Kit (Helicoil Type)


**$93.00** ~~~~

[View details](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/bsw-7-16-x-14-baercoil-kit-helicoil#product-info)

We ship with DPD

Order before 2pm for next day delivery

Need to collect? We are open 9am - 5pm Mon Friday Saturday 10am - 4PM

## Description

Complete BaerCoil Thread-Repair-Kit

Contents:

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Standard Drill

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Tap > ISO1-4H

1 x BaerCoil Inserting Tool

(with this Inserting tool you don't need a tang break tool)

\+ 10 BaerCoil Wire-Thread-Inserts "free running", stainless steel (ASIS 304), lenght: 1,5 x D

[BaerCoil instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

[Drill Sizes](http://www.baercoil.com/en/drill_sizes.html)

[BSW Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_bsw.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear

strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread

normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive,

medical and aerospace industries.

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## Delivery and Shipping

**Shipping Information**

Place your order before 2 PM for same-day shipping!

We partner with **DPD** for all deliveries, ensuring **full traceability** and a **one-hour delivery window**, so you don’t have to wait around all day.

**Shipping Cost:** €8.99

**Free Shipping:** On orders over €50

Fast, reliable, and hassle-free delivery—straight to your door!

All our orders are picked, packed and shipped in Dublin! Order before 2pm for Next Day DPD Delivery anywhere in Ireland.

Close

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/products/artb41419.jpg?v=1357386614&width=88)

BSW 9/16 x 12 BaerCoil® Kit (Helicoil Type)


**$167.00** ~~~~

[View details](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/bsw-9-16-x-12-baercoil-kit-helicoil#product-info)

We ship with DPD

Order before 2pm for next day delivery

Need to collect? We are open 9am - 5pm Mon Friday Saturday 10am - 4PM

## Description

Complete BaerCoil Thread-Repair-Kit

Content:

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Standard Drill

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Tap

\+ 5 BaerCoil Wire-Thread-Inserts "free running", stainless steel (ASIS 304), lenght: 1,5 x D

without Drill - suitable Drill in Shop

without Tang Break Tool - break tang with a needle-nosed pliers

[BaerCoil instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

[Drill Sizes](http://www.baercoil.com/en/drill_sizes.html)

[BSW Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_bsw.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear

strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread

normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive,

medical and aerospace industries.

### Payment & Security

Payment methods

- American Express
- Apple Pay
- Bancontact
- Google Pay
- iDEAL
- Maestro
- Mastercard
- Shop Pay
- Union Pay
- Visa

Your payment information is processed securely. We do not store credit card details nor have access to your credit card information.

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

**$167.00** ~~~~

Complete BaerCoil Thread-Repair-Kit

Content:

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Standard Drill

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Tap

\+ 5 BaerCoil Wire-Thread-Inserts "free running", stainless steel (ASIS 304), lenght: 1,5 x D

without Drill - suitable Drill in Shop

without Tang Break Tool - break tang with a needle-nosed pliers

[BaerCoil instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

[Drill Sizes](http://www.baercoil.com/en/drill_sizes.html)

[BSW Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_bsw.html)

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear

strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread

normally is stronger than the original one.

## Description

Complete BaerCoil Thread-Repair-Kit

Content:

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Standard Drill

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Tap

\+ 5 BaerCoil Wire-Thread-Inserts "free running", stainless steel (ASIS 304), lenght: 1,5 x D

without Drill - suitable Drill in Shop

without Tang Break Tool - break tang with a needle-nosed pliers

[BaerCoil instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

[Drill Sizes](http://www.baercoil.com/en/drill_sizes.html)

[BSW Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_bsw.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear

strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread

normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive,

medical and aerospace industries.

## Delivery and Shipping

**Shipping Information**

Place your order before 2 PM for same-day shipping!

We partner with **DPD** for all deliveries, ensuring **full traceability** and a **one-hour delivery window**, so you don’t have to wait around all day.

**Shipping Cost:** €8.99

**Free Shipping:** On orders over €50

Fast, reliable, and hassle-free delivery—straight to your door!

All our orders are picked, packed and shipped in Dublin! Order before 2pm for Next Day DPD Delivery anywhere in Ireland.

Close

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/products/ArtB41513.jpg?v=1357392963&width=88)

BSW 3/4 x 10 BaerCoil® Kit (Helicoil Type)


**$216.00** ~~~~

[View details](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/bsw-3-4-x-10-baercoil-kit#product-info)

We ship with DPD

Order before 2pm for next day delivery

Need to collect? We are open 9am - 5pm Mon Friday Saturday 10am - 4PM

## Description

Complete BaerCoil Thread-Repair-Kit

Content:

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Standard Drill

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Tap

\+ 5 BaerCoil Wire-Thread-Inserts "free running", stainless steel (ASIS 304), lenght: 1,5 x D

without Drill - suitable Drill in Shop

without Tang Break Tool - break tang with a needle-nosed pliers

[BaerCoil instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

[Drill Sizes](http://www.baercoil.com/en/drill_sizes.html)

[BSW Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_bsw.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear

strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread

normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive,

medical and aerospace industries.

### Payment & Security

Payment methods

- American Express
- Apple Pay
- Bancontact
- Google Pay
- iDEAL
- Maestro
- Mastercard
- Shop Pay
- Union Pay
- Visa

Your payment information is processed securely. We do not store credit card details nor have access to your credit card information.

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## Description

Complete BaerCoil Thread-Repair-Kit

Content:

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Standard Drill

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Tap

\+ 5 BaerCoil Wire-Thread-Inserts "free running", stainless steel (ASIS 304), lenght: 1,5 x D

without Drill - suitable Drill in Shop

without Tang Break Tool - break tang with a needle-nosed pliers

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear

strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread

normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive,

medical and aerospace industries.

BSW 1'' x 8 BaerCoil® Kit (Helicoil Type)


**$250.00** ~~~~

[View details](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/bsw-1-x-8-baercoil-kit#product-info)

We ship with DPD

Order before 2pm for next day delivery

Need to collect? We are open 9am - 5pm Mon Friday Saturday 10am - 4PM

## Description

Complete BaerCoil Thread-Repair-Kit

Content:

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Standard Drill

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Tap

\+ 4 BaerCoil Wire-Thread-Inserts "free running", stainless steel (ASIS 304), lenght: 1,5 x D

without Drill - suitable Drill in Shop

without Tang Break Tool - break tang with a needle-nosed pliers

[BaerCoil instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

[Drill Sizes](http://www.baercoil.com/en/drill_sizes.html)

[BSW Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_bsw.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear

strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread

normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive,

medical and aerospace industries.

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

BSF 3/16 x 32 BaerCoil® Kit (Helicoil Type)


**$82.00** ~~~~

## Description

Complete BaerCoil Thread-Repair-Kit

Content:

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Standard Drill

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Tap

1 x BaerCoil Inserting Tool

1 x BaerCoil Tang Break Tool

\+ 20 BaerCoil Wire-Thread-Inserts "free running", stainless steel (ASIS 304), lenght: 1,5 x D

[BaerCoil instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

[Drill Sizes](http://www.baercoil.com/en/drill_sizes.html)

[BSF Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_bsf.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear

strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread

normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive,

medical and aerospace industries.

## Description

Complete BaerCoil Thread-Repair-Kit

Content:

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Standard Drill

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Tap

1 x BaerCoil Inserting Tool

1 x BaerCoil Tang Break Tool

\+ 20 BaerCoil Wire-Thread-Inserts "free running", stainless steel (ASIS 304), lenght: 1,5 x D

[BaerCoil instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

[Drill Sizes](http://www.baercoil.com/en/drill_sizes.html)

[BSF Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_bsf.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear

strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread

normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive,

medical and aerospace industries.

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

normally is stronger than the original one.

BSF 3/8 x 20 BaerCoil® Kit (Helicoil Type)


**$85.00** ~~~~

[View details](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/bsf-3-8-x-20-baercoil-kit#product-info)

We ship with DPD

Order before 2pm for next day delivery

Need to collect? We are open 9am - 5pm Mon Friday Saturday 10am - 4PM

## Description

Complete BaerCoil Thread-Repair-Kit

Content:

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Standard Drill

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Tap

1 x BaerCoil Inserting Tool

1 x BaerCoil Tang Break Tool

\+ 15 BaerCoil Wire-Thread-Inserts "free running", stainless steel (ASIS 304), lenght: 1,5 x D

[BaerCoil instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

[Drill Sizes](http://www.baercoil.com/en/drill_sizes.html)

[BSF Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_bsf.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear

strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread

normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive,

medical and aerospace industries.

- Apple Pay

- Google Pay

- Maestro

- Visa

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## Delivery and Shipping

**Shipping Information**

Place your order before 2 PM for same-day shipping!

We partner with **DPD** for all deliveries, ensuring **full traceability** and a **one-hour delivery window**, so you don’t have to wait around all day.

**Shipping Cost:** €8.99

**Free Shipping:** On orders over €50

Fast, reliable, and hassle-free delivery—straight to your door!

All our orders are picked, packed and shipped in Dublin! Order before 2pm for Next Day DPD Delivery anywhere in Ireland.

Close

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/products/artb6841186.jpg?v=1357394002&width=88)

BSF 1/2 x 16 BaerCoil® Kit (Helicoil Type)


**$100.00** ~~~~

[View details](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/bsf-1-2-x-16-baercoil-kit-helicoil#product-info)

We ship with DPD

Order before 2pm for next day delivery

Need to collect? We are open 9am - 5pm Mon Friday Saturday 10am - 4PM

## Description

Complete BaerCoil Thread-Repair-Kit

Content:

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Standard Drill

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Tap

1 x BaerCoil Inserting Tool

1 x BaerCoil Tang Break Tool

\+ 10 BaerCoil Wire-Thread-Inserts "free running", stainless steel (ASIS 304), lenght: 1,5 x D

[BaerCoil instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

[Drill Sizes](http://www.baercoil.com/en/drill_sizes.html)

[BSF Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_bsf.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear

strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread

normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive,

medical and aerospace industries.

### Payment & Security

Payment methods

- American Express
- Apple Pay
- Bancontact
- Google Pay
- iDEAL
- Maestro
- Mastercard
- Shop Pay
- Union Pay
- Visa

Your payment information is processed securely. We do not store credit card details nor have access to your credit card information.

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

BSF 9/16 x 16 BaerCoil® Kit (Helicoil Type)


**$168.00** ~~~~

## Description

Complete BaerCoil Thread-Repair-Kit

Content:

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Standard Drill

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Tap

\+ 5 BaerCoil Wire-Thread-Inserts "free running", stainless steel (ASIS 304), lenght: 1,5 x D

without Drill - suitable Drill in Shop

without Tang Break Tool - break tang with a needle-nosed pliers

[BaerCoil instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

[Drill Sizes](http://www.baercoil.com/en/drill_sizes.html)

[BSF Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_bsf.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear

strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread

normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive,

medical and aerospace industries.

## Delivery and Shipping

**Shipping Information**

Place your order before 2 PM for same-day shipping!

We partner with **DPD** for all deliveries, ensuring **full traceability** and a **one-hour delivery window**, so you don’t have to wait around all day.

**Shipping Cost:** €8.99

**Free Shipping:** On orders over €50

Fast, reliable, and hassle-free delivery—straight to your door!

All our orders are picked, packed and shipped in Dublin! Order before 2pm for Next Day DPD Delivery anywhere in Ireland.

Close

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/products/artb2472043.jpg?v=1357394397&width=88)

BSF 5/8 x 14 BaerCoil® Kit (Helicoil Type)


**$169.00** ~~~~

[View details](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/bsf-5-8-x-14-baercoil-kit#product-info)

We ship with DPD

Order before 2pm for next day delivery

Need to collect? We are open 9am - 5pm Mon Friday Saturday 10am - 4PM

## Description

Complete BaerCoil Thread-Repair-Kit

Content:

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Standard Drill

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Tap

\+ 5 BaerCoil Wire-Thread-Inserts "free running", stainless steel (ASIS 304), lenght: 1,5 x D

without Drill - suitable Drill in Shop

without Tang Break Tool - break tang with a needle-nosed pliers

[BaerCoil instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

[Drill Sizes](http://www.baercoil.com/en/drill_sizes.html)

[BSF Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_bsf.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear

strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread

normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive,

medical and aerospace industries.

### Payment & Security

Payment methods

- American Express
- Apple Pay
- Bancontact
- Google Pay
- iDEAL
- Maestro
- Mastercard
- Shop Pay
- Union Pay
- Visa

Your payment information is processed securely. We do not store credit card details nor have access to your credit card information.

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## Description

Complete BaerCoil Thread-Repair-Kit

Content:

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Standard Drill

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Tap

\+ 5 BaerCoil Wire-Thread-Inserts "free running", stainless steel (ASIS 304), lenght: 1,5 x D

without Drill - suitable Drill in Shop

without Tang Break Tool - break tang with a needle-nosed pliers

[BaerCoil instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

[Drill Sizes](http://www.baercoil.com/en/drill_sizes.html)

[BSF Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_bsf.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear

strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread

normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive,

medical and aerospace industries.

## Description

Complete BaerCoil Thread-Repair-Kit

Content:

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Standard Drill

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Tap

\+ 5 BaerCoil Wire-Thread-Inserts "free running", stainless steel (ASIS 304), lenght: 1,5 x D

without Drill - suitable Drill in Shop

without Tang Break Tool - break tang with a needle-nosed pliers

[BaerCoil instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

[Drill Sizes](http://www.baercoil.com/en/drill_sizes.html)

[BSF Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_bsf.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear

strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread

normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive,

medical and aerospace industries.

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## Description

Complete BaerCoil Thread-Repair-Kit

Content:

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Standard Drill

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Tap

1 x BaerCoil Inserting Tool

1 x BaerCoil Tang Break Tool

\+ 5 BaerCoil Wire-Thread-Inserts "free running", stainless steel (ASIS 304), lenght: 2,0 x D

[BaerCoil instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

[Drill Sizes](http://www.baercoil.com/en/drill_sizes.html)

[BSF Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_g.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear

strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread

normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive,

medical and aerospace industries.

G (BSP) 3/8 x 19 BaerCoil® Kit (Helicoil Type)


**$151.00** ~~~~

[View details](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/g-bsp-3-8-x-19-baercoil-kit-helicoil#product-info)

We ship with DPD

Order before 2pm for next day delivery

Need to collect? We are open 9am - 5pm Mon Friday Saturday 10am - 4PM

## Description

Product information

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit G 3/8 x 19

With this BaerCoil® thread repair set it is possible to repair through hole and blind hole threads in G (BSP) 3/8 x 19.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. With the inserts you avoid waste in your components and can recycle them. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping out.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. For the thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) is cut for the wire thread insert. This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

For repair directly on the thread, this thread repair set contains various auxiliary tools, such as the core drill bit, hand tap with oversize for insert thread, insertion tool and wire thread inserts made of stainless steel.

No tang breaker is included in this set. The tang can be broken with the installation tool. To do this, pull back the installation tool after installation and turn it 90° so that it rests on the tang. Then strike the tool briefly at the back.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, if necessary, to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 3/8 |
| Pitch | 19 |
| Dimension | G (BSP) 3/8 x 19 |
| Length | 2,0 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 19,05 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 2.0 D means 2 times the calculation diameter: 2 times 9.525 mm=19.05 mm<br>The nominal diameter for G (BSP) 3/8 is approx. 16.66 mm, but according to the standard the length is calculated with the diameter of 9.525 mm for calculation purposes |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts - Repair kits |
| Product type | BaerCoil thread repair kits |
| Thread standard | G (BSP): British Standard Pipe Thread according to DIN ISO 228 - Cylindrical pipe thread |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and for thread reinforcement of through-hole and blind-hole threads.

### Technical drawing

![](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | 3/8 |
| Length | 2,0 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 19,05 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 0,720 '' - 0,787 '' |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |
| B (thread depth with chamfer) | 0,935 '' |
| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 0,988 '' |

### Content

- 1 x 111170: BaerCoil HSS twist drill bit with countersunk shank 17.00 mm
- 1 x B3313: BaerCoil HSSG single-cut tap G 3/8 x 19 EG
- 1 x EBW14: BaerCoil Installation tool G 3/8 x 19
- 5 x B8382-2: BaerCoil thread inserts G 3/8 x 19 - Length: 2.0 D - Type: free-running - Material: A2 (1.4301)
